<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/programs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Liste tous les programmes de l'utilisateur avec filtres et pagination

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"isActive","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Filter by active status","schema":{"example":true,"type":"boolean"}},{"name":"isTemplate","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Filter by template status","schema":{"example":false,"type":"boolean"}},{"name":"startDateFrom","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Filter programs starting from this date","schema":{"example":"2024-01-01","type":"string"}},{"name":"startDateTo","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Filter programs starting until this date","schema":{"example":"2024-12-31","type":"string"}},{"name":"limit","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Number of programs to return (max 100)","schema":{"default":20,"example":20,"type":"number"}},{"name":"offset","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Number of programs to skip","schema":{"default":0,"example":0,"type":"number"}},{"description":"Filter by active status","required":false,"name":"isActive","in":"query","schema":{"example":true,"type":"boolean"}},{"description":"Filter by template status","required":false,"name":"isTemplate","in":"query","schema":{"example":false,"type":"boolean"}},{"description":"Filter programs starting from this date","required":false,"name":"startDateFrom","in":"query","schema":{"example":"2024-01-01","type":"string"}},{"description":"Filter programs starting until this date","required":false,"name":"startDateTo","in":"query","schema":{"example":"2024-12-31","type":"string"}},{"description":"Number of programs to return (max 100)","required":false,"name":"limit","in":"query","schema":{"default":20,"example":20,"type":"number"}},{"description":"Number of programs to skip","required":false,"name":"offset","in":"query","schema":{"default":0,"example":0,"type":"number"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Liste des programmes récupérée avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"programs":{"description":"List of programs","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Program ID","example":"clh123456789"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"Program title","example":"Follicular Phase Strength Training"},"goal":{"type":"object","description":"Program goal","example":"Build strength during follicular phase"},"startDate":{"type":"string","description":"Program start date","example":"2024-01-15T00:00:00.000Z"},"endDate":{"type":"object","description":"Program end date","example":"2024-02-15T00:00:00.000Z"},"isActive":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the program is currently active","example":true},"isTemplate":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this program is a template","example":false},"createdAt":{"type":"string","description":"Creation timestamp","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","description":"Last update timestamp","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"exerciseCount":{"type":"number","description":"Number of exercises in the program","example":8},"exercises":{"description":"Exercises in this program (only included in detailed view)","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"exerciseId":{"type":"string","description":"Exercise ID","example":"clh456789123"},"order":{"type":"number","description":"Order of this exercise in the program","example":1},"sets":{"type":"number","description":"Number of sets","example":3},"reps":{"type":"string","description":"Number of repetitions (can be range like \"8-12\")","example":"10-15"},"duration":{"type":"number","description":"Duration in seconds for time-based exercises","example":30},"restTime":{"type":"number","description":"Rest time in seconds between sets","example":60},"notes":{"type":"string","description":"Additional notes for this exercise","example":"Focus on form over speed"}},"required":["exerciseId","order"],"title":"ProgramExerciseDto"}}},"required":["id","title","goal","startDate","endDate","isActive","isTemplate","createdAt","updatedAt","exerciseCount"],"title":"ProgramResponseDto"}},"total":{"type":"number","description":"Total count of programs (for pagination)","example":15},"offset":{"type":"number","description":"Current page offset","example":0},"limit":{"type":"number","description":"Number of programs returned","example":10}},"required":["programs","total","offset","limit"],"title":"ProgramListResponseDto"}}}}}}
 id="program-controller-get-user-programs-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
